content.rendered:
Empower Your Business with
Managed IT Services

Unleash your business potential – entrust us with IT management so you can focus on growth.

Schedule a free consultation
Explore our services

Tailored Managed IT Services for Your Company’s Success

Say goodbye to IT infrastructure, maintenance, and management concerns. Redirect your resources toward realizing your business vision and fueling growth while we handle the technical side.

Local Expertise for Affordable and Comprehensive Support


  • Local Expertise: Our seasoned IT professionals are committed to delivering top-tier support, leveraging their deep industry knowledge to conquer any challenge your business encounters.

  • Cost Savings: Our tailored IT packages cut unnecessary expenses, prioritizing efficiency and high-quality support to help your business save significantly.

  • Comprehensive Solutions: From round-the-clock IT infrastructure monitoring to seamless vendor management, we provide end-to-end support for all your IT requirements, ensuring efficient and effective management in every aspect of your IT.

Read more

IT Infrastructure Health Monitoring (24/7/365)

Proactive Issue Prevention: Stop problems before they disrupt your operations.

Patch Management

Stay Updated, Stay Secure: Ensure your servers, network equipment, and workstations are always current.

User Training

Empower Your Team: Equip your staff with the knowledge to use IT resources effectively.

Reporting (Weekly, Monthly, Yearly)

Stay Informed: Keep track of your IT infrastructure’s health with regular reports.

Remote and On-site Support

Timely Assistance: Get the help you need, when and where it matters.

Backup Solutions

Data Protection: Safeguard your information with local and cloud backups for both infrastructure and workstations.

VOIP and Video Surveillance Support

Reliable Communication and Security: Ensure your communication and surveillance systems are always operational.

IT Consulting

Expert Guidance: Get valuable advice on optimizing your IT infrastructure.

Vendor Management

Streamlined Relationships: Let us manage your IT vendor connections to save you time and effort.

CUSTOM IT SOLUTIONS, PROACTIVE MONITORING, EXPERT GUIDANCE


  • Tailored IT Solutions: We evaluate your specific requirements and craft a customized IT package to match your business objectives and budget, delivering substantial cost savings.

  • Proactive Monitoring: Our round-the-clock infrastructure health monitoring prevents issues before they disrupt your operations.

  • Expert Consultation: With over 20 years of experience in IT, our experts oversee your IT needs and offer advice on cost reduction, modernization, and staying competitive.

Read more

Explore Streamlined IT Solutions with a Free Consultation


  • Reach Out for a Free Consultation: Start by contacting us to schedule your complimentary consultation.

  • Customize Your Package: We’ll assess your specific needs and create a personalized IT plan tailored to your business goals and budget.

  • Let Us Take Care of the Rest: Sit back and relax as our team handles all your IT requirements seamlessly.

Contact us

Elevate Your Business – Reach Out Today!

For over 25 years, TechProComp IT Solutions has proudly served small and medium-sized businesses as your trusted local IT partner. Our proven enterprise-level IT practices, combined with our experienced and attentive team, ensure seamless solutions that drive your business forward.

At TechProComp, we prioritize creating a respectful and secure environment for our clients, valuing both their business and privacy. Our client relationships are built on a foundation of mutual trust and understanding, ensuring that every interaction feels not just professional, but friendly and accommodating.

We are committed to providing the highest level of respect and support to all our clients, regardless of the scale of their operations or the complexity of their projects. If you’re looking for an IT partner who truly understands and values your business, schedule a brief 15-minute meeting with us. Let’s collaborate to take your business to new heights.

Contact Us Today

Shared IT Responsibility

Promoting Collaborative Tech Management

Explore the concept of shared IT responsibility, where collaboration is key for efficient technology management in your business.

Read more

Outsourced IT Services

Efficient External Tech Management

Learn about the benefits of outsourcing IT services, providing expert technology management solutions for your business.

Read more

In-House IT Department

Dedicated Technology Management

Discover the advantages of an internal IT department, offering tailored technology solutions to support your business professionally.

Read more

So your IT situation just isn’t working for your expanding business?

Say goodbye to complicated IT, multitasking stress, and constant ticket piles. With TechProComp, turn these problems into smooth IT operations.

Our Awards

We’ve earned our reputation as a top IT Managed Service Provider through our commitment to exceptional customer service, innovative problem-solving, and a track record of successful projects.

TESTIMONIAL

Our Happy Customers

This level of dedication and immediacy is unique; it makes a significant difference in our experience with them.

VR Sports Training Company

TechProComp is a solid managed service provider. They have delivered unparalleled service in every regard. Their team have a great grasp of technical knowledge, and have consistently demonstrated reliability, tackling both minor and critical issues with effective resolutions. Beyond their technical prowess, they truly shine in customer service, offering quick and thought out responses. Their commitment to their clients is apparent in their proactive IT management approach, ensuring smooth business operations, and helping reduce costs. I recommend TechProComp to anyone seeking dependable and personable IT support.

CarbonBetter

TechProComp is 100% worth it! They are quick to solve any IT issues you are experiencing. They are skilled in Mac and Windows computers and are proficient in a wide variety of software. Let them take care of any of your IT needs, you won’t regret it!

Shippy Properties Management

“TechProComp’s service level and responsiveness are impressive.”

TechProComp has been instrumental in filling in as an outsourced network administrator, helping the client make their network more secure by finding and fixing important vulnerabilities. The team is responsive, communicative, and willing to work after hours to fix issues.

Salient Systems

“TechProComp has never dropped the ball; their customer service is outstanding.”

TechProComp IT Solutions’ efficiency and speed have been instrumental in helping the client grow their team and keep their systems operating. The team is flexible, communicative, and thorough. Additionally, they’re knowledgeable about current technologies, and their customer service is impressive.

Feniex Industries

“Their response time when any issues arise is impressive.”

The company systems are operating smoothly and efficiently, thanks to TechProComp’s work. They manage the engagement well and coordinate with the firm’s employees effectively. They communicate on time with the client to avoid disruptions in their work, and they’re responsive when problems occur.

CPM Texas

“They help with whatever we need and very quickly.”

TechProComp IT Solutions resolves issues quickly and does not hesitate to reach out whenever problems occur. Regular meetings and discussions ensure a seamless workflow. Customers can expect a friendly and prompt team.

Retina Care Company

The quality of the work was outstanding, especially compared to the pricing and service we received from other firms.

Thomson Patent Law

Slobo and his team have been wonderful to work with. When the ice storm hit this February him and his team kept us up to date and kept the project rolling even through the power outages. When working with TechProComp I felt valued and taken care of the entire time. Having a running tracker of the project was really nice to have. Anytime a decision needed to be made, Slobo would present recommendations and give me a pressure free experience while also providing great advice. It is very obvious when working with them that they know what they are doing. They supported our move to a cloud based infrastructure, helping us use more modern technology that saves us money. On top of being a pleasure to work with, their prices were very fair and their estimate gave us an accurate price to keep in mind. We look forward to working with them more in the future!

ProTex Plumbing and Mechanical

TechProComp is very professional. Slobo, and his team are really knowledgeable about a wide range of issues. Slobo has really helped us out when other services have become overwhelmed due to the pandemic. Thanks so much!

Thompson Patent Law

Great company for all of your IT services!!!!! Very happy customer!!!!!!

Best Western Plus Hotel

Subscribe

Subscribe to our newsletter & stay updated

TechProComp, with 25 years in IT, provides enterprise-level solutions and skilled support to advance small and medium businesses. A reliable MSP IT Partner, we ensure your business’s steady growth.

CONTACT US

Schedule A Free Consultation
